verses.text: Not unto us, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, andfor thy truth’s sake.
Wherefore should the heathen say, Where isnow their God?
But our God isin the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
Their idols aresilver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
They that make them are like unto them; so isevery one that trusteth in them.
O Israel, trust thou in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: he istheir help and their shield.
O house of Aaron, trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: he istheir help and their shield.
Ye that fear the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: he istheir help and their shield.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath been mindful of us: he will bless us;he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
He will bless them that fear the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, bothsmall and great.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
Ye areblessed of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*which made heaven and earth.
The heaven, eventhe heavens, arethe \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
The dead praise not the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*, neither any that go down into silence.
But we will bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*.
